newsitem.title: SIERRA LEONE: Heavy fighting in Sierra Leone army power fight.
newsitem.headline: Heavy fighting in Sierra Leone army power fight.

text.p: Heavy shooting erupted in the Sierra Leone capital Freetown on Sunday, witnesses said, and a military spokesman went on state radio to order all politicians to report to army headquarters.
The spokesman, who identified himself as Corporal Gborie, said the fighting was an internal matter and ordered Nigerian and Guinean troops stationed in Sierra Leone to keep out.
He condemned the government of President Ahmad Tejan Kabbah, saying: "We want democracy but not this democracy."
"All ministers and other politicians should immediately report to military headquarters," the spokesman said.
